title: Provided that height of any Exhibition Hall or Convention Hall greater than 4
clause_text: Provided that height of any Exhibition Hall or Convention Hall greater than 4.20 meters shall not be deemed to have consumed an additional FSI of 50% of the relevant floor area.
section: 33 (22) Regulation for Exhibition-cum-Convention Centers in MCGM Area

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided that height of any Exhibition Hall or Convention Hall greater than 4.20 meters shall not be deemed to have consumed an additional FSI of 50% of the relevant floor area.
